title: EXT_feature_metadata glTF Mesh Primitive extension
description: `EXT_feature_metadata extension` for a primitive in a glTF model, to associate it with the root `EXT_feature_metadata` object.

featureIdAttributes.description: An array of objects mapping per-vertex feature IDs to a feature table.

featureIdTextures.description: An array of objects mapping per-texel feature IDs to a feature table.

featureTextures.description: An array of IDs of feature textures from the root `EXT_feature_metadata` object.
